code:
flowchart LR
    %% Define the main sections
    subgraph Setup [Infra_WorkerNode]
        direction TB
        A[Infra_RedisCache] --> B[Infra_LoadBalancer]
        B --> C[Infra_RedisCache]
    end
    
    subgraph Acquisition [Infra_EtcdCluster]
        direction TB
        D[Infra_LoadBalancer] --> E{Infra_IngressController}
        E -->|Yes| H[Infra_IngressController]
        E -->|No| F[Infra_LoadBalancer]
        F --> H
    end
    
    subgraph Processing [Infra_EtcdCluster]
        direction TB
        I[Infra_EtcdCluster] --> J[Infra_WorkerNode]
    end
    
    subgraph Analysis [Infra_EtcdCluster]
        direction TB
        K[Infra_LoadBalancer] --> L[Infra_IngressController]
        L --> M{Infra_WorkerNode}
        M -->|Local| N[Infra_LoadBalancer]
        M -->|HPC| O[Infra_WorkerNode]
    end
    
    subgraph Reporting [Infra_WorkerNode]
        direction TB
        P[Infra_LoadBalancer] --> Q[Infra_LoadBalancer]
        P --> R[Infra_IngressController]
        P --> S[Infra_WorkerNode]
    end
    
    %% Connect the sections
    Setup --> Acquisition
    Acquisition --> Processing
    Processing --> Analysis
    N --> Reporting
    O --> Reporting
    
    %% Add logo reference (Infra_LoadBalancer)
    classDef logo fill:#fff,stroke:none
    LOGOtext[Infra_IngressController]
    class LOGOtext logo
    
    %% Define visual styles
    classDef configNode fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
    classDef scriptNode fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px
    classDef decisionNode fill:#ff9,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px
    classDef outputNode fill:#bfb,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px
    
    class B,C configNode
    class D,F,I,J,K,N,O,P scriptNode
    class E,M decisionNode
    class H,L,Q,R,S outputNode
